languages.text: Вся скверна Януса взялась из премудростей нечестивых книжников! Отец Иеронимус Скорбный, проповедник культа святого Друза, посетит Янус и произведет процедуру благословенного размежевания агрокомплексов и разметки ирригационных систем. Он будет опираться не на советы безбожных Генеторов, а на мудрые примеры из жития святых, наставления праведных писаний и богоугодную священную геометрию иконописцев. Да восторжествует вера над ученостью бездушного металла!

All of the corruption on Janus originated in the sophistries of unholy scholars! Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a preacher of the Cult of Saint Drusus, is going to visit Janus to perform the procedure of blessed delimitation of the agri-complexes and demarcation of the irrigation systems. Instead of relying on the advice of godless Genetors, he will be guided by the wise examples set in hagiographies of the saints, the teachings of righteous scriptures, and the pious sacred geometry of the iconographers. May faith triumph over the sophistication of soulless metal!

languages.text: ¡La corrupción de Janus tiene su origen en los sofismas de los eruditos sacrílegos! El reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso, predicador del Culto de San Drusus, visitará Janus para celebrar el rito de la bendita delimitación de los complejos agrícolas y la demarcación de los sistemas de riego. En vez de guiarse por los consejos de genetores impíos, seguirá el ejemplo de las hagiografías de los santos, las enseñanzas de las escrituras y la geometría sagrada de los iconógrafos. ¡Que la fe triunfe contra la sofisticación de un metal sin alma!
languages.original_text: All of the corruption on Janus originated in the sophistries of unholy scholars! Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a preacher of the Cult of Saint Drusus, is going to visit Janus to perform the procedure of blessed delimitation of the agri-complexes and demarcation of the irrigation systems. traits.locale_text: ¡La corrupción de Janus tiene su origen en los sofismas de los eruditos sacrílegos! El reverendo Hieronymus Doloroso, predicador del Culto de San Drusus, visitará Janus para celebrar el rito de la bendita delimitación de los complejos agrícolas y la demarcación de los sistemas de riego. En vez de guiarse por los consejos de genetores impíos, seguirá el ejemplo de las hagiografías de los santos, las enseñanzas de las escrituras y la geometría sagrada de los iconógrafos. ¡Que la fe triunfe contra la sofisticación de un metal sin alma!

languages.text: Toute la corruption gangrenant Janus est la conséquence du sophisme d'érudits sacrilèges ! Le révérend Hiéronymus Doloroso, prêcheur du Culte de Saint Drusus, va se rendre sur Janus pour y accomplir les procédures sacrées de délimitation des agri-complexes et de démarcation des systèmes d'irrigation. Plutôt que de s'en remettre aux conseils de genetors hérétiques, il se laissera guider par les savants exemples donnés dans les hagiographies des saints, l'enseignement des écritures et la pieuse géométrie des iconographes. Puisse la foi triompher des sophistications du métal sans âme !
languages.original_text: All of the corruption on Janus originated in the sophistries of unholy scholars! Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a preacher of the Cult of Saint Drusus, is going to visit Janus to perform the procedure of blessed delimitation of the agri-complexes and demarcation of the irrigation systems. Instead of relying on the advice of godless Genetors, he will be guided by the wise examples set in hagiographies of the saints, the teachings of righteous scriptures, and the pious sacred geometry of the iconographers. May faith triumph over the sophistication of soulless metal!

Puisse la foi triompher des sophistications du métal sans âme !

languages.text: 加努斯的所有腐化都源于邪恶学者的巧舌如簧！圣德鲁苏斯教派的布道士希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师准备前往加努斯，为综合农业中心执行赐福，圈定灌溉系统的边界。他决心不再依赖不虔诚的基因士提供的装置，而是要以圣徒传记中的圣人为榜样，按照正统经文的教诲，遵循圣像画师虔诚精妙的神圣几何技法践行信仰。愿忠诚的信仰战胜没有灵魂的金属造物！
languages.original_text: All of the corruption on Janus originated in the sophistries of unholy scholars! Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a preacher of the Cult of Saint Drusus, is going to visit Janus to perform the procedure of blessed delimitation of the agri-complexes and demarcation of the irrigation systems. Instead of relying on the advice of godless Genetors, he will be guided by the wise examples set in hagiographies of the saints, the teachings of righteous scriptures, and the pious sacred geometry of the iconographers. May faith triumph over the sophistication of soulless metal!

traits.locale_text: 加努斯的所有腐化都源于邪恶学者的巧舌如簧！圣德鲁苏斯教派的布道士希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索牧师准备前往加努斯，为综合农业中心执行赐福，圈定灌溉系统的边界。他决心不再依赖不虔诚的基因士提供的装置，而是要以圣徒传记中的圣人为榜样，按照正统经文的教诲，遵循圣像画师虔诚精妙的神圣几何技法践行信仰。愿忠诚的信仰战胜没有灵魂的金属造物！

languages.text: ヤヌスの腐敗はすべて、不浄な学者たちの詭弁に端を発している！聖ドルスス教団のプリーチャー、ヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭は、ヤヌスを訪れ、農業施設の祝福された境界策定の手続きと、灌漑システムの整理を行う予定である。神をも恐れぬ遺伝学者の助言に頼るのではなく、聖人の伝記に記された賢明な模範、正しき聖典の教え、聖図書の敬虔な神聖幾何学に導かれるであろう。信仰が、魂のない金属の洗練に勝利せんことを！
languages.original_text: All of the corruption on Janus originated in the sophistries of unholy scholars! Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a preacher of the Cult of Saint Drusus, is going to visit Janus to perform the procedure of blessed delimitation of the agri-complexes and demarcation of the irrigation systems. Instead of relying on the advice of godless Genetors, he will be guided by the wise examples set in hagiographies of the saints, the teachings of righteous scriptures, and the pious sacred geometry of the iconographers. May faith triumph over the sophistication of soulless metal!

traits.locale_text: ヤヌスの腐敗はすべて、不浄な学者たちの詭弁に端を発している！聖ドルスス教団のプリーチャーたるヒエロニムス・ドロローソ司祭は、ヤヌスを訪れ、農業施設の祝福された境界策定の手続きと、灌漑システムの整理を行う予定である。神をも恐れぬ遺伝学者の助言に頼るのではなく、聖人の伝記に記された賢明な模範、正しき聖典の教え、聖図書の敬虔な神聖幾何学に導かれるであろう。信仰が、魂のない金属の洗練に勝利せんことを！

languages.text: Die gesamte Korruption auf Janus ist nur durch die Sophisterei unheiliger Gelehrter entstanden! Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, ein Prediger des Kults des Hl. Drusus, wird Janus besuchen, um die Prozedur der heiligen Delimitation der Agri-Komplexe und der Demarkation der Bewässerungssysteme durchzufühern. Anstatt sich auf den Rat gottloser Genetoren zu verlassen, lässt er sich von den weisen Vorbildern aus den Hagiographien der Heiligen, den Lehren der rechtschaffenen Schriften und der frommen heiligen Geometrie der Ikonographen leiten. Möge der Glaube über die Sophistikation des seelenlosen Metalls triumphieren!
languages.original_text: All of the corruption on Janus originated in the sophistries of unholy scholars! May faith triumph over the sophistication of soulless metal!

languages.text: Janus'taki tüm yozluk, melun âlimlerin safsatalarından ortaya çıkmıştır! Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nın vaizi Muhterem Hieronymus Doloroso, Janus'u ziyaret edip tarım komplekslerinde kutsal tahdit işlemini uygulayacak ve sulama sistemlerinin hudutlarını belirleyecek. İlahsız Genetörlerin tavsiyelerine bel bağlamaktansa azizlerin hayat öykülerinde geçen akla uygun örnekleri, mukaddes yazıtlardaki öğretileri ve ikona çizerlerinin kutsal şekillerini benimseyecek. İmanın gücü, ruhsuz metallerin suniliğine üstün gelsin!
languages.original_text: All of the corruption on Janus originated in the sophistries of unholy scholars! Reverend Hieronymus Doloroso, a preacher of the Cult of Saint Drusus, is going to visit Janus to perform the procedure of blessed delimitation of the agri-complexes and demarcation of the irrigation systems. Instead of relying on the advice of godless Genetors, he will be guided by the wise examples set in hagiographies of the saints, the teachings of righteous scriptures, and the pious sacred geometry of the iconographers. May faith triumph over the sophistication of soulless metal!
